1: @//ma de bzhin du//tshog drag lci ba can ldan no//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas pad m'i na bza' dang //rdo rje padama'i dbang phyag ma dang//bada ma gar gyi dbang
2: phyag ma dang //sna tshogs pad ma zhes bya ba pad+ma rigs kyi lha mo bzhi yis gsungs so //gling bu ma tshogs 'dus pa dang //sgo srungs mtshogs 'dus pa ste//mtog ma tshogs 'dus pa yang//
3: pad mas mtshan ma 'dzin par zad//dang po'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs te//dpal padma gar gyi
4: dbang phyug gi dkil 'khor la sngags byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o//o yig tig le dang ldan pas //sgra yig i dang ldan pa'o//bden bral phi rol pa la yang//byang las bzhi pa gang
5: yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan//dbus las pzhi ba gang yin pa//tsheg drag a yig sbyor bar bya//bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas //sgra yig i yis brgyan pa ste //byang las
6: zhi ba gang yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan//dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa//sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya//de bzhin dbus las dbu ma la//tsheg drag dang ni mnyam por ldan//
7: bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas// sgra yig  dang sbyor bar bya//byang las bzhi pha gang yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab macan dang ldan//bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas//tsheg drag mnyam po
8: ldan pa yi// dbus las tha ma pa dang ldan//de bzhin ba den bral phyi rol pa//sgra yig i dang spor bar bya//byang la s bzhi bagang yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan//dbus las bzhi
